ygData.subject: Re: Neutral base under attack!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Clash was hit dead on, and a sound was heard, a mysterious wild sound. Clash had a hold blown straight through him. It started to heal. Clash: What was that?

Clash was hit dead on, and a sound was heard, a mysterious wild sound. Clash
had a hold blown straight through him. It started to heal.

Clash: What was that? No matter, you won't survive this battle!

Clash fires 4 octopus disks with razorblades at Nightlight...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 11, 2001 12:31 AM
Subject: Re: Neutral base under attack!!!!!
